review: This capo is awesome, it looks and feels very nice and premium, it works on all of my guitars not much more you can ask for.
For 10 bucks this is great, very sturdy and reliable. Works wit all my guitars, and for the price it is a steal.
The strap is very reliable, the pick pocket is a nice touch, but if playing for extended periods of times, you might want to go with something more comfortable.
Awesome little tuner, very accurate and I can store it almost anywhere. much cheaper online too, for the price its a steal.
Nice feeling to them, they get the job done and that about sums it all up, can't expect to much more from them.
